description.en:
The course will be dealing with three main topics.

The first is learning about Artificial Intelligence. Students will have an opportunity to aquire a more nuanced view of what Artificial Intelligence is, what it is not and its historical genesis.

The second is learning with Artificial Intelligence. Students will have an opportunity to acquire knowledge about the different AI-assisted tools and gain practical insights into how (not) to use them for learning and teaching.

The third is preparing for Artificial Intelligence. Students will have an opportunity to reach a better understanding of the impacts of Artificial Intelligence on education and, more in general, in society.
description.et:
Kursusel käsitletakse kolme põhiteemat.

Esimene on tehisintellekti tundmaõppimine. Tudengitel on võimalus saada nüansirikkam ülevaade sellest, mis tehisintellekt on ja mis see ei ole ning milline on selle kujunemisprotsess.

Teine on tehisintellektiga õppimine. Tudengitel on võimalus omandada teadmisi erinevate tehisintellektil põhinevate tööriistade kohta ja saada praktilisi teadmisi selle kohta, kuidas neid õppimiseks ja õpetamiseks (mitte) kasutada.

Kolmas valmistab tudengeid tehisintellektiks ette. Tudengid õpivad paremini mõistma tehisintellekti mõju haridusele ja üldisemalt ühiskonnale.

objectives.en: Acquire knowledge about what Artificial Intelligence is, what it is not and its historical genesis;
objectives.et: Omandada teadmisi selle kohta, mis tehisintellekt on ja mis see ei ole ning milline on olnud selle kujunemisprotsess;
Omandada teadmisi tehisintellektil põhinevate tööriistade kohta;

objectives.en: Gain practical insights about the use of AI-assisted tool in and for education;
objectives.et: Saada praktilisi teadmisi tehisintellektil põhinevate tööriistade kasutamisest hariduses;

objectives.en: Reach a better understanding of Artificial Intelligence on education and, more in general, in society.
objectives.et: Saada parem arusaam tehisintellektist hariduses ja ühiskonnas laiemalt.

learning_outcomes.en: After completing the course, the student:

Be acquainted with what Artificial Intelligence is and its historical genesis

Be able to make decisions regarding how to use AI-assisted tools for teaching and learning

Be able to articulate and discuss the impacts of Artificial Intelligence on education and society
learning_outcomes.et:
On kursis tehisintellekti ja selle kujunemisprotsessiga

Suudab teha otsuseid selle kohta, kuidas kasutada tehistintellektil põhinevaid tööriistu õpetamisel ja õppimisel

Oskab arutleda tehisintellekti mõjude üle haridusele ja ühiskonnale

independent_work.en: The final assessment will be a project in which students will be asked to reflect on one particular AI-assisted tool.
